text: Oh how this brings back memories. I used to leave the console on every night since there was no save feature. I did complete the game in the end all by myself without looking anything up on the net. So proud of myself. Yey me!!!

author: Sephzilla

text: I remember renting this game very well. Hit Start and they throw you right into the jungle in the middle of hostile dinosaurs, hear a man say "Welcome to Jurassic Park" before this track hits your speakers. I love the mix of ambient noises (just like in Secret of Evermore) and the groovy drums + bass. I also remember being quite scared when you'd go inside a building and the game would turn into a Doom clone. The small field of view due to the  goggles made it scary when you'd encounter dinos.
author: SupraDarky
